item.title: Version 1.2.16 (Build 20251225.2)
item.description:
What's New

Fix auto-fix logic for 'ưo → ươ' pattern

  • Fixed 'thuở' incorrectly becoming 'thưở' by adding ending consonant check

before auto-fix in insertMarkInternal. Auto-fix now only applies when

there's an ending consonant (n, c, i, m, p, t) like in 'thương', 'người'

  • Fixed 'thưởng' becoming 'tưởng' (missing 'h') by:

1. Adding deltaBackSpace parameter to insertMarkInternal to properly

calculate backspaceCount when last character hasn't been sent to screen

2. Preserving hookState in checkMarkPosition when mark position doesn't

need adjustment (isAdjusted=false), preventing incorrect overwrite of

backspaceCount calculated by checkVowelAutoFix

  • Added debug logging for backspaceCount calculation in checkVowelAutoFix

Version: 1.2.16 (20251225.2)
